jobDescription: OverviewPeraton is seeking a Software Developer for Web Applications in Alexandria VA to support our Naval Research Laboratory (NRL) Customer.Responsibilities Develop and implement security architectures for enterprise systemsCreate and implement federated identity management and access control solutions for data sharing among different organizationsProvide data protection mechanisms that satisfy need-to-knowPerform vulnerability assessments of systemsDevelop applications using tools such as JDBC and TOMCAT (non-exhaustive list) to enable access to databases housing enterprise data to support the development of security measures.Candidate must be proficient in the development of applications in Java with the capability to handle massive data inputs from various platforms and other sources.Proficiency with the development of security measures in a heterogeneous environment is a plus.
